definitions.text: a written message addressed to a person or organization
examples: mailed an indignant letter to the editor

definitions.text: the conventional characters of the alphabet used to represent speech
examples: his grandmother taught him his letters

definitions.text: owner who lets another person use something (housing usually) for hire
a strictly literal interpretation (as distinct from the intention)
examples: he followed instructions to the letter
he obeyed the letter of the law

definitions.text: an award earned by participation in a school sport
examples: he won letters in three sports

definitions.text: set down or print with letters
mark letters on or mark with letters
